statements: SELECT * FROM manufacturing_data ORDER BY production_id ASC
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM manufacturing_data WHERE production_cost > 1000
SELECT product_name, production_cost FROM manufacturing_data WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_data WHERE product_name LIKE '%chair%'
SELECT SUM(production_cost) AS total_cost FROM manufacturing_data
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_data ORDER BY production_date DESC, production_cost ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, production_cost FROM manufacturing_data WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01' AND production_cost < 1000 ORDER BY production_cost DESC
SELECT MAX(production_cost) AS max_cost, MIN(production_cost) AS min_cost FROM manufacturing_data
SELECT production_id, product_name, SUM(production_cost + operational_cost) AS total_cost FROM manufacturing_data GROUP BY production_id, product_name HAVING total_cost > 50000
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_data WHERE product_name LIKE '%chair%'
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_analysis_production_data
SELECT product_id, production_date FROM manufacturing_analysis_production_data
SELECT company_id, production_quantity FROM manufacturing_analysis_production_data ORDER BY production_quantity DESC
SELECT employee_id, efficiency_rating FROM manufacturing_optimization WHERE efficiency_rating > 0.8
SELECT company_id, employee_id, optimization_date FROM manufacturing_optimization ORDER BY optimization_date
SELECT company_id, product_id, production_quantity, production_date FROM manufacturing_analysis_production_data WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_optimization WHERE optimization_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT company_id, SUM(production_quantity) AS total_production FROM manufacturing_analysis_production_data GROUP BY company_id;
SELECT product_id, MAX(efficiency_rating) AS max_efficiency FROM manufacturing_optimization WHERE optimization_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT company_id, employee_id, COUNT(*) AS total_optimizations FROM manufacturing_optimization GROUP BY company_id, employee_id ORDER BY company_id, total_optimizations DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductionData
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM ProductionData
SELECT company_id, company_name, location FROM ManufacturingCompanies ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT cost_id, cost_description, cost_amount FROM OperationalCosts WHERE cost_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM ManufacturingCompanies WHERE industry='Automotive'
SELECT * FROM ProductionData ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM ProductionData WHERE id = 3;
SELECT company_name, location, industry FROM ManufacturingCompanies WHERE industry = 'Tech';
SELECT * FROM OperationalCosts WHERE cost_amount > 500;
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM ProductionData WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM production_data;
SELECT product_name, production_date, quantity FROM production_data WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT id, process_name FROM manufacturing_process ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT expense_name, cost FROM operational_costs WHERE date_incurred BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT strategy_name, impact_factor, implementation_date FROM optimization_strategies WHERE impact_factor > 5 ORDER BY implementation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM operational_costs WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY date_incurred DESC;
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM production_data WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY production_date ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, impact_factor FROM optimization_strategies WHERE impact_factor BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.0 ORDER BY strategy_name;
SELECT expense_name, SUM(cost) AS total_cost FROM operational_costs GROUP BY expense_name HAVING total_cost > 5000;
SELECT process_name, machine_id, total_time FROM manufacturing_process WHERE total_time < 5.0 ORDER BY machine_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM production_data;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM production_data ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT id, process_name FROM manufacturing_processes WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM product_inventory WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT process_name, efficiency_score, target_score FROM process_efficiency ORDER BY efficiency_score DESC, target_score ASC;
SELECT * FROM production_data WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM production_data ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM product_inventory;
SELECT AVG(efficiency_score) AS avg_efficiency FROM process_efficiency WHERE target_score > 80;
SELECT process_name, time_taken, cost FROM manufacturing_processes WHERE cost < 5000 ORDER BY time_taken DESC;
